header.annotationScheme: Guidelines for the syntactic annotation of the Ancient Greek dependency treebank 1.1

respStmt.resp: Annotator and corrector of the students' work. The following students contributed to this annotation: Ayla De Schutter; Charlotte Knapen; Christophe Weets; Enya Van Nunen; Isabeau De Smet; Kato Poelmans; Leen Van Bever; Lien Verlaet; Lisbeth De Laet; Milan Valadou; Olympe De Backer; Sigrid Keupers; Stijn Vangenechten; Thomas Valgaeren; Tilke Nelis
